column4: is there any program that can search a doc file[resume] in my computer that was modified some 2 months back??
I have to find my resume on my comp but there seems to be tons of resume.doc on my system... I updated my resume some 2 months back but can not find it
is there any way i can locate that file with ;name' and ' Modified date'
i dont know the drictory, its in the computer
its hard from command line for me
are you sure the name and the modified day? ~ extend the day to within 90 days may be .
yes the name and modified dates are right

find / -iname '*.doc' -mtime -90  2> /dev/null                     this will give you all the doc edited within 3 moths. if you can't find it ~ you must have somthing wrong, like you didn't mount the drive ~ it is in USB in your pocket etc.
it gives me a list on command line but i dont know wht to do with that
like i said the list is the file named *.doc which edited within past 3 months ~ .... the resume should be in the list
I see a list of files after inserting the command but how can i locate the file
YOUR COMMAND IS RIGHT BUT I LACK THE KNOWLEDGE OF INTERPRETING THE COMMAND LINE TO LOCATE THE FILE
lol~ that's all we can help ~ as per your discription ~ the find didn't hit ~ . open the document editor and hope that it is in the recently opened list :>

are you sure it is not in external drive etc? have you email it ,if so check your SENT box? unless you wanna let ppl ssh in you PC and help the search  (risking stealing your info , install virus maybe ;p j/k ) , that all i can help.
hope i find the resume and the job too
i hope i find a job too XD! later ~    OT.
